question: 建築
sourceMnemonic: When it comes to <kanji>build</kanji>ing and <kanji>construct</kanji>ing, the thing that puts them all together into one is <vocabulary>architecture</vocabulary>. If you don't have any architecture, who knows what the <vocabulary>building</vocabulary> will look like.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
